languages.text: "Пусть этот гордый девиз вдохновляет ваших офицеров. Под знаменем нашей любви они совершат великие подвиги и одолеют самых страшных врагов!" {n}Довольная собой, Джай с лукавой улыбкой взирает на вас.{/n}

"So that these proud words will inspire your officers. They will perform great deeds and overcome the most fearsome enemies under the banner of our love!" {n}Pleased with herself, Jae looks at you with a mischievous grin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Пусть этот гордый девиз вдохновляет ваших офицеров. Под знаменем нашей любви они совершат великие подвиги и одолеют самых страшных врагов!" {n}Довольная собой, Джай с лукавой улыбкой взирает на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So that these proud words will inspire your officers. They will perform great deeds and overcome the most fearsome enemies under the banner of our love!" {n}Pleased with herself, Jae looks at you with a mischievous grin.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So that these proud words will inspire your officers. They will perform great deeds and overcome the most fearsome enemies under the banner of our love!" {n}Pleased with herself, Jae looks at you with a mischievous grin.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So that these proud words will inspire your officers. They will perform great deeds and overcome the most fearsome enemies under the banner of our love!" {n}Pleased with herself, Jae looks at you with a mischievous grin.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “这样一来，这些自豪的话语就会激励你的军官。他们将会在我们爱的旗帜下成就伟业，战胜最为可怕的敌人！”{n}婕伊露出了顽皮的笑容，对自己的做法很是满意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So that these proud words will inspire your officers. They will perform great deeds and overcome the most fearsome enemies under the banner of our love!" {n}Pleased with herself, Jae looks at you with a mischievous grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这样一来，这些自豪的话语就会激励你的军官。他们将会在我们爱的旗帜下成就伟业，战胜最为可怕的敌人！”{n}婕伊露出了顽皮的笑容，对自己的做法很是满意。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「この誇り高き言葉が、士官たちの意気を高めんことを。彼らは偉業を成し遂げ、あたしたちの愛の旗の下で、最も恐ろしい敵に打ち勝つのさ！」{n}満足げなジェイは、いたずらっぽい笑みを浮かべてあなたを見つめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So that these proud words will inspire your officers. They will perform great deeds and overcome the most fearsome enemies under the banner of our love!" {n}Pleased with herself, Jae looks at you with a mischievous grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この誇り高き言葉が、士官たちの意気を高めんことを。彼らは偉業を成し遂げ、あたしたちの愛の旗の下で、最も恐ろしい敵に打ち勝つのさ！」{n}満足げなジェイは、いたずらっぽい笑みを浮かべてあなたを見つめる。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Para que estas orgullosas palabras inspiren a sus oficiales. Realizarán grandes gestas y superaran a los enemigos más feroces, ¡todo en nombre de nuestro amor!». {n}Jae, satisfecha, te lanza una sonrisa traviesa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So that these proud words will inspire your officers. They will perform great deeds and overcome the most fearsome enemies under the banner of our love!" {n}Pleased with herself, Jae looks at you with a mischievous grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Para que estas orgullosas palabras inspiren a sus oficiales. Realizarán grandes gestas y superaran a los enemigos más feroces, ¡todo en nombre de nuestro amor!». {n}Jae, satisfecha, te lanza una sonrisa traviesa.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Pour que ces mots emplis de fierté puissent inspirer vos officiers. Ils réaliseront de grandes choses et vaincront les adversaires les plus redoutables sous la bannière de notre amour ! » {n}Contente d'elle, Jae vous regarde avec un sourire malicieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So that these proud words will inspire your officers. They will perform great deeds and overcome the most fearsome enemies under the banner of our love!" {n}Pleased with herself, Jae looks at you with a mischievous grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pour que ces mots emplis de fierté puissent inspirer vos officiers. Ils réaliseront de grandes choses et vaincront les adversaires les plus redoutables sous la bannière de notre amour ! » {n}Contente d'elle, Jae vous regarde avec un sourire malicieux.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Diese stolzen Worte sollen Eure Offiziere inspirieren. Sie werden dadurch große Taten vollbringen und die furchterregendsten Feinde unter dem Banner unserer Liebe besiegen!" {n}Jae ist zufrieden mit sich und blickt dich verschmitzt grinsend an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So that these proud words will inspire your officers. They will perform great deeds and overcome the most fearsome enemies under the banner of our love!" {n}Pleased with herself, Jae looks at you with a mischievous grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diese stolzen Worte sollen Eure Offiziere inspirieren. Sie werden dadurch große Taten vollbringen und die furchterregendsten Feinde unter dem Banner unserer Liebe besiegen!" {n}Jae ist zufrieden mit sich und blickt dich verschmitzt grinsend an.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bu gurur dolu sözler, subaylarına ilham kaynağı olsun diye. Aşkımızın sancağı altında nice yüce başarılar sergileyecek, nice dehşet verici düşmanı alt edecekler!" {n}Jae, kendinden hoşnutça ve haylaz bir gülümsemeyle sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So that these proud words will inspire your officers. They will perform great deeds and overcome the most fearsome enemies under the banner of our love!" {n}Pleased with herself, Jae looks at you with a mischievous grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu gurur dolu sözler, subaylarına ilham kaynağı olsun diye. Aşkımızın sancağı altında nice yüce başarılar sergileyecek, nice dehşet verici düşmanı alt edecekler!" {n}Jae sana kendinden hoşnut bir şekilde, haylaz bir gülümsemeyle bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
